LanguageData.rxGas_Sleeping.label: sleeping gas cloud
LanguageData.rxGas_Sleeping.description: Knocks out living organisms after enough exposure. Rapidly dissipates when under an open sky.
LanguageData.rxGas_SleepingRefined.label: refined sleeping gas cloud
LanguageData.rxGas_SleepingRefined.description: Knocks out living organisms after enough exposure. Rapidly dissipates when under an open sky.
